means: 征（兵）( levy的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Spain imposed levies on farm imports from non-member states.
sentence.Network_cn: 西班牙对来自非成员国的进口农产品征税。

sentence.Network_en: At that time, taxes and levies were as many as the hairs on an ox.
sentence.Network_cn: 那时, 苛捐杂税多如牛毛.

sentence.Network_en: Variable levies can insulate farmers and consumers from world markets.
sentence.Network_cn: 差价进口税可以把农民和消费者与世界市场隔离开来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: egypt levies no inheritance or capital gains taxes ., 埃及征收的税款没有继承或资本收益税.
The pressure on dams and levies is very strong ., 对大坝以及征税工作的压力巨大.
and while they spoke of broad economic cooperation , Hu slapped the US for recently hitting Chinese tires and steel with new levies .当谈到更广泛的经济合作时，**主席直接批评了美国最近对中国轮胎和钢铁实施新标准的行为。

on the international solidarity levies proposed by France , Hu said China has always supported international development cooperation and appreciates and actively supports this proposal .关于法国提出国际互助捐税倡议，胡锦涛表示，中方一贯支持发展领域的国际合作，赞赏并积极支持法方倡议。

list.abs: tax levy纳税;征收税款levy on征税;扣押levy tax征税.
希高翻译-经济词汇中英对照十六 ... Fines and Forfeitures 罚款及没收物 Fiscal Levy 财政税收 Fiscal Policy 财政政策.
税务英语_百度文库 ... capital interest tax 资本利息税 capital levy 资本税 capital transfer tax 资本转移税.
关税_百度百科 ... 进口附加税（ Import Surtaxes） ·差价税（variable levy）（ Variable Levy） 反倾销税（ Anti-dumping Duties）.
商务相关专业术语 ... Import Surtax 进口附加税 Variable Levy 差额税 Sliding Duty 滑动关税.

entry.def: A levy is a sum of money that you have to pay, for example as a tax to the government.

example.ex: ...an annual motorway levy on all drivers.
example.tran: 以所有司机为征收对象的高速公路年税

entry.def: If a government or organization levies a tax or other sum of money, it demands it from people or organizations.

example.ex: They levied religious taxes on Christian commercial transactions...
example.tran: 他们对基督徒的商业交易征收宗教税。

example.ex: Taxes should not be levied without the authority of Parliament.
example.tran: 未经议会授权不得征税。

auth_sentence.res_content: The subsidy will be funded by levies on energy bills.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The subsidy will be funded by levies on energy bills.

auth_sentence.content: Such levies could stifle whatever revival carriers are able to muster.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such levies could stifle whatever revival carriers are able to muster.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such levies could stifle whatever revival carriers are able to muster.

auth_sentence.content: Uganda scrapped its tax on paraffin but maintained petrol and diesel levies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Uganda scrapped its tax on paraffin but maintained petrol and diesel levies.
